sn2.12:1: Ekamantaṁ ṭhito kho veṇḍu devaputto bhagavato santike imaṁ gāthaṁ abhāsi:
sn2.12:2: "Sukhitāva te manujā,sugataṁ payirupāsiya;Yuñjaṁ gotamasāsane,appamattā nu sikkhare"ti.
sn2.12:3: "Ye me pavutte siṭṭhipade, (veṇḍūti bhagavā)Anusikkhanti jhāyino;Kāle te appamajjantā,Na maccuvasagā siyun"ti.
